about_the_game:
It was a lab mouse, created from birth to be used in experiments, a product of combining human genes with its own. Due to a moment of negligence by the researchers, it escaped from the fate designed for it and fled to safety.

With a mouse’s instinct to hide and survive in human dwellings, it found refuge in the attic of a certain house after escaping.

Due to work requirements, you’ve been assigned by your superiors to live in a remote house, where you continue your monotonous life. However, each night at midnight, you start to hear strange noises coming from the attic… What kind of beginning awaits you?

❗This is a feeding simulation game designed for female players with slight horror, bloody violence, and a touch of the bizarre. Suitable for ages 17+ in the visual novel genre.❗

The game revolves around raising a half-human, half-mouse creature. You can feed it different foods, teach it various skills, and make different choices that lead the little lab mouse to evolve in various forms—and to different endings between you two.

❗ Warning ❗

The game contains graphic depictions, including dissection, internal organs, abuse, and killing, as well as flashing imagery that may be unsettling and/or trigger seizures in players with photosensitive epilepsy.

This game may not be suitable for all audiences.

It was a lab mouse, created from birth to be used in experiments, a product of combining human genes with its own. Due to a moment of negligence by the researchers, it escaped from the fate designed for it and fled to safety.

With a mouse’s instinct to hide and survive in human dwellings, it found refuge in the attic of a certain house after escaping.

Due to work requirements, you’ve been assigned by your superiors to live in a remote house, where you continue your monotonous life. However, each night at midnight, you start to hear strange noises coming from the attic… What kind of beginning awaits you?

❗This is a feeding simulation game designed for female players with slight horror, bloody violence, and a touch of the bizarre. Suitable for ages 17+ in the visual novel genre.❗

The game revolves around raising a half-human, half-mouse creature. You can feed it different foods, teach it various skills, and make different choices that lead the little lab mouse to evolve in various forms—and to different endings between you two.

The game contains graphic depictions, including dissection, internal organs, abuse, and killing, as well as flashing imagery that may be unsettling and/or trigger seizures in players with photosensitive epilepsy.

name: Experimental gnawer No.44: Observation Record

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7(SP1+)and above
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Due to work requirements, you have been assigned by your superior to live in a remote residence, continuing your monotonous and dull life. However, every midnight, you hear strange noises coming from the attic... What kind of beginning awaits you?
